title: Esoteric Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Esoteric Acupuncture Esoteric acupuncture focuses on wellness versus addressing disease or physical imbalances. They are not like typical acupuncture sessions. Esoteric acupuncture sessions are a gateway that initiates spiritual healing through chakra balancing and sacred geometry. A door can open for you to access a deeper part of your consciousness. Sessions can align you with your higher self and reconnects you with your heart. Schedule an appointment for [acupuncture](http://carinecamara.com/acupuncture-la/) in Los Angeles, CA today. Esoteric Acupuncture is designed so that we may uncover our own true puzzle piece of life. It is important that we pursue our own dreams and our own goals. We must learn our inner, Spiritual Higher Heart again. I am not merely talking about the emotional heart but our Higher, Inner, Spiritual Heart. - Dr. Mikio
